parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Carbon Monoxide Emissions from Hot Water Heater
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The hot water heater emits high levels of carbon monoxide, which can be fatal in enclosed spaces, posing a significant risk to the health and safety of individuals in the vicinity.
symptoms: None reported
as the issue is related to the emission of a colorless
odorless gas.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The faulty steering gearbox can cause the vehicle to wander or drift while driving, making it difficult to control, which can lead to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: Excessive free play in the steering wheel
the vehicle wanders or drifts while driving
delayed response to steering input
sudden and excessive movement of the front wheels
difficulty controlling the vehicle
especially when passing large vehicles.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunctioning cruise control can cause unexpected acceleration, loss of control, and distraction, which can lead to accidents.
symptoms: Cruise control engages or disengages unexpectedly
wipers and air horn activate suddenly and cannot be shut off
cruise control engages while backing up
short circuit in the steering column
design flaw in the cruise control system.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Propane Fumes Leak into Vehicle Cabin
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The leakage of propane fumes into the vehicle cabin can cause health risks to occupants, including dizziness, nausea, and respiratory problems, and potentially lead to accidents due to impaired driver alertness.
symptoms: Strong smell of propane fumes inside the vehicle
no warning signs or symptoms before the smell appears
the smell is present at any speed
occupants may experience health problems such as dizziness
nausea
or respiratory issues.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A faulty fuel system component can cause propane fumes to leak into the vehicle cabin, posing health risks to occupants and potentially leading to accidents.
symptoms: Strong smell of propane fumes inside the vehicle
no warning signs or symptoms before the smell appears
the smell is present at any speed
occupants may experience health problems such as dizziness
nausea
or respiratory issues.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Brake Overheating and Extended Stopping Distance
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The overheating of brakes can lead to a significant increase in stopping distance, which can cause accidents, especially in emergency braking situations.
symptoms: The brakes overheat
the vehicle takes longer to stop than usual
the brake pedal feels spongy or soft
there is a burning smell or smoke coming from the brakes.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the trailer hitch tongue can cause the trailer to detach from the vehicle while in motion, leading to accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: Scraping or grinding noise
visual inspection reveals buckling or deformation of the trailer hitch tongue
loss of trailer connection
trailer detachment while in motion.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The under-designed trailer hitch can cause the trailer to detach from the vehicle while in motion, leading to accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: Scraping or grinding noise
visual inspection reveals buckling or deformation of the trailer hitch tongue
loss of trailer connection
trailer detachment while in motion.
